entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
